contentrichtext.text: {{For|the South African pioneering heart surgeon|Christiaan Barnard}} {{notability|date=November 2011}}{{BLPsources|date=November 2011}} '''Christian Bernard''' (born 30 November 1951), [[Frater Rosae Crucis|F.R.C.]], is the current ({{As of|2012|lc=on}}) [[Imperator]]<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.rosicrucian.org/about/bio_imperator.html |title=Imperator Christian Bernard Biography |publisher=Rosicrucian.org |date=1990-04-12 |accessdate=2012-03-24}}</ref> of [[Ancient Mystical Order Rosae Crucis|AMORC]], a [[mystical]] [[Rosicrucian]] order. He became Imperator on 12 April 1990. == References == {{reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.rosicrucian.org/about/bio_imperator.html Biography from AMORC USA] * [http://www.rosicrucian.org/newsarchive/2003/08imperatorsmessage.html The Spiritualization and Humanization of the World] {{Authority control|VIAF=27093536}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Bernard, Christian | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = 30 November 1951 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Bernard, Christian}} [[Category:1951 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Rosicrucians]] {{France-reli-bio-stub}}
